subject: Basketball
Deaths (Obituaries)
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Mr. Spoonhour was 373-202 in 19 seasons as a Division I men’s coach, leading Southwest Missouri State to five N.C.A.A. tournament appearances and St. Louis to three.
snippet: Mr. Spoonhour was 373-202 in 19 seasons as a Division I men’s coach, leading Southwest Missouri State to five N.C.A.A. tournament appearances and St. Louis to three.
